Programs_of_Study_for_Enrollment_Effecti.description: Wrapper element for Programs of Study for Enrollment Program Data

validation.validation: You cannot submit an override for a non-Title IV program of study.
You can only override for a program of study in a valid status. Valid statuses include pending completion, in progress, and matriculated.
You cannot submit an override for the primary program of study of the student's reporting record.

validation.validation: There is no program of study or record change for the effective date
validation.description: There is no program of study or record change for the effective date

validation.validation: You must use the Edit Program of Study for Load Status task to delete financial aid record snapshots without a corresponding program of study change for the students listed here. To preserve the Academic Requirements Used setting, update a previous or later snapshot to reflect the configuration. To preserve the Reporting Record change, contact your records administrator to update a previous or later snapshot.
